lukasz.name: Lukasz Pietraszek
lukasz.title: UI Developer
lukasz.about: Freelance UI/Front-end developer with proven track-record over five years in creating clean, accessible and user-friendly responsive websites. Self motivated and adaptable, independent minded, with a keen eye for detail. Experienced in working with Agile methodologies.
lukasz.specialities: Specialities: HTML5, CSS3, Web Design/Development, RWD, Usability, Web Standards, Axure RP
